a07
Class ElevatorView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  a07.ElevatorView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ElevatorView
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Praktikum: P2P
Semester: WS10
Aufgaben-Nr.: 07
Version: V1
Aenderungen: Quellen: API, Swing

Description:
This class represents the GUI or the view in MVC-Pattern.
Including the JPanels for the different Areas, the LabelList for the ElevatorLabels, the JButton[] for the CallButtons and the ActionListener for the Buttons.

Author:
Mueller-Pettenpohl, Tell #1989982, Rumpf, Soeren #1971654

See Also:
Serialized Form
